Uses of Interface
io.wcm.caravan.pipeline.cache.CacheStrategy

  • Packages that use CacheStrategy 
    Package Description
    io.wcm.caravan.pipeline
    JSON Pipeline API
    io.wcm.caravan.pipeline.cache
    JSON Pipeline API for Cache Handling.

    • Uses of CacheStrategy in io.wcm.caravan.pipeline

      Methods in io.wcm.caravan.pipeline with parameters of type CacheStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JsonPipeline JsonPipeline.addCachePoint(CacheStrategy strategy)
      Makes the result of the current pipeline cacheable.

    • Uses of CacheStrategy in io.wcm.caravan.pipeline.cache

      Methods in io.wcm.caravan.pipeline.cache that return CacheStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CacheStrategy CacheStrategies.noCache()
      No caching.
      static CacheStrategy CacheStrategies.nonTransientAndTimeToIdle(int duration, TimeUnit unit)
      Invalidate item after a time-to-idle interval: The content is considered immutable, and storage time will be extended to specified value on each get operation on this item, so it is kept in cache as long as it is requested.
      static CacheStrategy CacheStrategies.temporary(int duration, TimeUnit unit)
      Stores items only in the local, non-persistent CacheAdapter for the given maximum duration.
      static CacheStrategy CacheStrategies.timeToIdle(int duration, TimeUnit unit)
      Invalidate item after a time-to-idle interval: The content is considered immutable, and storage time will be extended to specified value on each get operation on this item, so it is kept in cache as long as it is requested
      static CacheStrategy CacheStrategies.timeToLive(int duration, TimeUnit unit)
      Invalidate item after a fixed time-to-live interval, using the same duration as storage time and revalidation-interval
